Location
19 Vendue Range, Charleston, SC 29401 View The Rooftop at on Google Maps Call The Rooftop by phone at (843) 414-2337 Get Directions to The Rooftop via Google Maps 
11:30am – 10:00pm
SUNDAY - THURSDAY 
11:30am – 12:00am
FRIDAY & SATURDAY 
About

Awarded “Best Rooftop Bar” By Charleston City Paper since 2007, we offer views for miles… The perfect setting for drinks with a plentiful menu to fuel your good times. A lively gem that satisfies both locals and visitors seven days a week for lunch and dinner.

. For groups of 30 to 50, reach out to .
No reservations needed or taken [email protected] Contact Sales
